Title: Metro Imdb
Description: This project uses Mah Apps WPF Metro theme and imdbapi.org Rest Api to display data. It saves the titles in local disk.
HomeWiki:
Metro IMDB

This project is created in WPF 4.5, Visual Studio 2012. 

The aim of the project is to use IMDB Rest API using http://imdbapi.org/

Note: Make sure you are using it for non-commercial purposes. (private use only)

The application makes use of Mah Apps Metro Theme for WPF. (http://mahapps.com/MahApps.Metro/)
